headline: Nvidia, Microsoft, and OpenAI: This Chart Captures AI’s ‘Circular Financing.’
summary: Since Nvidia agreed last month to invest $100 billion in its customer OpenAI, investors and analysts who follow artificial intelligence have awakened to that industry’s circularity.  Nvidia  puts money into OpenAI.  Amid the scoffing, Morgan Stanley analyst Todd Castagno mapped the AI ecosystem’s circular flows in a Wednesday note.

headline: Q3 earnings will be 'validation moment' for AI spend: Dan Ives
summary: Big Tech heavy hitters will report their third quarter earnings in the coming October weeks, which will give Wall Street a better sense of how much these companies are investing in AI and artificial intelligence infrastructures. Wedbush Securities managing director and global head of technology research Dan Ives discusses how investors are still underestimating the AI super cycle propelling markets (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) higher. headline: Rishi Sunak hired as a senior adviser by Microsoft - but given stern warning
summary: Former PM Rishi Sunak has been hired by tech giant  Microsoft.  The ex-Tory leader, who remains an MP in parliament, has joined the Seattle-based tech firm as a paid part-time senior adviser and will give the company "high-level strategic perspectives on macro-economic and geopolitical trends" as well as how these "intersect with innovation, regulation and digital transformation".  Acoba, the watchdog that assesses external jobs for MPs, has said Sunak will not be advising on UK policy matters.

raw.headline: Rishi Sunak hired as a senior adviser by Microsoft - but given stern warning
raw.summary: Former PM Rishi Sunak has been hired by tech giant  Microsoft.  The ex-Tory leader, who remains an MP in parliament, has joined the Seattle-based tech firm as a paid part-time senior adviser and will give the company "high-level strategic perspectives on macro-economic and geopolitical trends" as well as how these "intersect with innovation, regulation and digital transformation".  Acoba, the watchdog that assesses external jobs for MPs, has said Sunak will not be advising on UK policy matters.

Also catch Daniel Newman and Patrick Moorhead weigh in on whether bubbles are forming in the AI trade and the main driver behind the latest round of AI deals.
